The surprise jump in new jobless claims filings to the highest level since mid-September signals a weakening in the labor market that could drag down the economy into the first quarter.

articles.author: Adrianna Rodriguez
articles.title: No, the COVID-19 vaccine doesn’t cause infertility in women - USA TODAY
articles.description: Experts concede the Pfizer/BioNTech Phase 3 trials did not include pregnant women, however, real world examples sufficiently debunk this claim.
articles.content:
Experts say real world examples can debunk infertility claims.
USA TODAY

articles.author: Hanna Ziady, CNN Business
articles.title: ECB unleashes $600 billion in new stimulus to prop up Europe's economy - CNN
articles.description: The European Central Bank is expanding its huge money-printing program by hundreds of billions of euros, an attempt to prop up the economy as another wave of coronavirus rips through the region and threatens to derail its fragile recovery.
